Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Alternate Controller Enabled (ACE) insulin infusion pump
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Hybrid closed loop predictive control algorithm
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DEKA Loop interoperable automated glycemic controller software for automated insulin delivery with compatible iCGM and ACE pumps.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for management of type 1 diabetes mellitus in persons six years and older using compatible integrated CGMs and ACE pumps to automatically adjust basal insulin and recommend/deliver correction boluses when glucose is predicted to exceed configurable thresholds; single patient use, prescription only.
